sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import tealLogo1 from '../img/1.jpg'; import tealLogo2 from '../img/2.jpg'; function VoteTeam({ team, index, voteHomeTeam, voteDraw, voteAwayTeam }) { return (
Category: {team.sport}

Country: {team.country}

Group: {team.group}

Status: {team.state==='STARTED' ? "Running" : "Not running"}

{team.homeName}

VS

{team.awayName}

); } export default VoteTeam;
